# ggonion

R package for drawing onion diagrams with ggplot2

WIP (Work in progress)

## Installation

You can install development version if ggonion from Github with

```
devtools::install_github("i2z1/ggonion")
```

## Usage


```{r}
library(ggonion)

x <- c("one", "two", "three")
clr <- c("red","yellow", "green")
ggonion(x, color = clr)
```
